info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Fremont, south central El Paso and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Florence to near Pueblo West to near Pueblo. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Pueblo, Florence, Pueblo West, Pinon, Penrose and Canon City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
